name: Other lipid-modifying drugs
title: Total cost of prescriptions for bile acid sequestrants, fibrates, nicotinic acid, and omega-3 fatty acid compounds
per 1000 registered patients
description: Total cost of prescriptions for bile acid sequestrants, fibrates, nicotinic acid, and omega-3 fatty acid compounds
why_it_matters: NICE guidance suggests that, for the vast
majority of people who need treatment for high cholesterol, these drugs should not be used.
There is no evidence that omega 3 fatty acids reduce the chances of patients getting cardiovascular disease.
